basic_info.description: ðŸ‘‹ I'm Abdinasir Yussuf. Writing code always seemed like a chore to me but that's only because I never applied/understood what It meant to Problem solve. Problem solving is what push the web to where its at now. Being able to produce a clean and concise piece of code that does exactly what you intend is nothing short of satisfying; however, being able to tackle a problem and solve it...now that's the real reward.

projects.title: MadLibs
projects.description: webpage that takes user inputs from a series of prompts that generates a creative story from that input. This will solve the users boredom by engaging their brain in a nice story driven rpg. The user will get inspiration from exercising their creativity.

projects.title: Busmall
projects.description: I built a website called Bus-Mall . Generates random combination of pictures to choose from. Then it displays the total views and clicks each picture has and saves that data to local storage, persisting the data.It does all of the things that it accomplishes well. I should describe the purpose and functionality so those that visit my README understand the app

projects.title: Salmon Cookies
projects.description: I built a website called Salmon Cookies . Generates random numbers of customers and cookies sold. Then it displays the cookies sold per hour and at the end shows a total amount of cookies sold for each store.It does all of the things that it accomplishes well. I should describe the purpose and functionality so those that visit my README understand the app
